client.map

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.base.Controller
      • client.map.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IMapController, java.util.Observer

    public class MapController
extends Controller
implements IMapController, java.util.Observer
    Implementation for the map controller

      • placeRoad

        public void placeRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        Called by GUI when the user selects a valid edge location to build a road. However if we are using road builder then we keep track of the roads before sending off the request to the server.
        Specified by:
        placeRoad in interface IMapController
        Parameters:

      • placeRobber

        public void placeRobber(HexLocation hexLoc)
        Replaces the robber on a given hex. Used for both robbing and soldier plays. Determines which players may be robbed around specified hex and displays appropriate windows. State must be robbing or playing in order to initiate.
        Specified by:
        placeRobber in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        hexLoc - The robber location

      • startMove

        public void startMove(PieceType pieceType,
             boolean isFree,
             boolean allowDisconnected)
        Function that is called when a move is started. Depending on which stated we are in, different overlays are used.
        Specified by:
        startMove in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        pieceType - The type of piece to be placed
        isFree - true if the piece should not cost the player resources, false otherwise. Set to true during initial setup and when a road building card is played.
        allowDisconnected - true if the piece can be disconnected, false otherwise. Set to true only during initial setup.

      • cancelMove

        public void cancelMove()
        Ends a move sequence.
        Specified by:
        cancelMove in interface IMapController

      • playSoldierCard

        public void playSoldierCard()
        Called when the Soldier development card is used. Allows the robbing action dictated by current player.
        Specified by:
        playSoldierCard in interface IMapController

      • playRoadBuildingCard

        public void playRoadBuildingCard()
        Called when the RoadBuilding development card is used. Allows the building of two free roads.
        Specified by:
        playRoadBuildingCard in interface IMapController

      • robPlayer

        public void robPlayer(RobPlayerInfo victim)
        Robs the specified player, closes the modal, and sends information to the clientfacade.
        Specified by:
        robPlayer in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        victim - The player to be robbed

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
          java.lang.Object arg)
        Every time time there is an updated version of the Game model. This function will fire and update the map controller with the updated information. --Redraws map. --Triggers robbing sequence.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
